titleStmt.title: The remors of conscyence here begynneth certayne demonstracyons by our lorde to all synfull persones with the remors of mannes conscyence to the regarde of the bounte of our lorde.
titleStmt.author: Lichfield, William, d. 1448.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete-strete at ye sygne of ye Sonne by me Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Known in manuscripts as "The complaynt of God".
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
In this edition, title page line 4 begins: stracyons.
Identified as STC 5605 on UMI microfilm reel 133.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 20 (British Library copy) and at reel 133 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
